review: Really good for laying in bed and using your phone as a remote. The picture quality is ok and it's really easy to use. Highly recommend for non tv provider people
author: Tanner Bragg

review: The most amazing thing about the chromecast has got to be the price. You are essentially getting a computer stick for $40 and is able to play HD content.The chrome tab extension is a must!The only downside is that it does not support Amazon Prime, which is understandable since Amazon has they're own stick.However, since I do have Amazon Prime and would like to watch some shows on the big screen, I have to bring my Xbox One downstairs just to play HBO shows.Other than that, this is great for the price and content that is available to it.
